channel.title: Create variable output
channel.description:
Hi,
I want to create a 'variable output', it's mean i want a new field in result of my workflow which i can call with
> <% task(my_task).result.my_variable %>
I tried with the ouput option but it's not working.
Someone has an idea ? :slight_smile:

item.title: Create variable output
item.dc:creator: punkrokk
item.description:
Hi @User42. I’d checkout orquesta - Orquesta — StackStorm 3.1.0 documentation - mistral support is going away soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Create variable output
item.dc:creator: User42
item.description:
Hi,

I want to create a ‘variable output’, it’s mean i want a new field in result of my workflow which i can call with

<% task(my_task).result.my_variable %>

I tried with the ouput option but it’s not working.

Someone has an idea ?
